featured.name: Spencer Mathews
featured.text: I had my gas furnace, air conditioning, and water heater replaced by Snyder in the span of two weeks. Everyone was very friendly and courteous, and the technicians that came to do the work were very knowledgeable and very friendly. Everyone I've interacted with, in the office or technicians, has been delightful.

featured.name: Patricia Murphree
featured.text: Snyders has a quick response, from quote to fix, service was amazing! Chaz was awesome. They know what they are doing and help you figure out the fix.

featured.name: Nicole Jameson
featured.text: The tech, Julian, came out to service our heater and did a fantastic job! He is very knowledgeable and also took the time to explain things to me. I appreciated that and highly recommend them also!

featured.name: John Glenn
featured.text: My water heater was not heating to temperature for quite a while. I called and they had an idea what it might be. They brought the part they thought they needed with them, verified what was wrong and changed it quickly. Chaz and Josh were very polite and clean. Works great now.

featured.name: Betsy Barker
featured.text: We had them install an on-demand water heater this past summer. It developed a leak, and they were right back out to repair it. Great customer service.

featured.name: Alissa Hyzer
featured.text: They were able to find and fix an issue that another company didn't or couldn't fix due to the age of the equipment (early 90's). Thanks Snyder! Heater hadn't worked in a long time.
